# FWTX DAO

> Fort Worth Municipal DAO - Web3 civic innovation, digital sovereignty,
> and decentralized governance community in Fort Worth, Texas.

FWTX DAO is a community-driven decentralized autonomous organization building
open source assets at the intersection of blockchain, AI, and physical systems
for civic infrastructure in Fort Worth, Texas.

## Core Pages
- [About](https://fwtx.city/about): Mission, team, and community overview
- [Blog](https://fwtx.city/blog): Research on Web3, DAOs, cybersecurity, and civic tech
- [Programs](https://fwtx.city/pricing): Workshops, roundtables, and participation details
- [Contact](https://fwtx.city/contact): Get involved - community@fwtx.city

## Blog Articles
- [FWTX DAO Initiative](https://fwtx.city/blog/fwtx-dao-initiative): Decentralized initiative for civic excellence
- [Web3 Excellence](https://fwtx.city/blog/fwtx-web3-excellence): Fort Worth Web3 thought leadership
- [NextGen Workforce](https://fwtx.city/blog/fwtx-nextgen-workforce): Next-generation workforce development
- [Web3 Infrastructure Security](https://fwtx.city/blog/web3-infrastructure-security): Security insights
- [Non-Linear InfoSec](https://fwtx.city/blog/next-gen-non-linear-infosec): Information security research

## Resources
- [Whitepaper](https://constitution.fwtx.city/): FWTX DAO Constitution
- [Innovation Bounties](https://innovate.fwtx.city): Community innovation program
